title: Bug 116829 - Label height not changing with label font modification
description:
Description: When the font size of a label is modified, its height does not change immediately.
Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open the application.
2. Go to the settings menu.
3. Increase or decrease the font size of the label.
4. Observe the label's height remains the same.

Expected Behavior: Upon modifying the label's font size, the label's height should adjust accordingly to properly display the new font size.
